name: @fylgja/auto-grid
description: A super small grid with auto flowing behavior based on the container size. Using a similar method to container queries
author: Fylgja

scripts.build:layer: npx sass layer.scss layer.css --no-source-map -s compressed -I node_modules
scripts.build:main: npx sass auto-grid.scss auto-grid.css --no-source-map -s compressed -I node_modules
scripts.build: npm run build:layer && npm run build:main
